name: mc-wallet-swap
description: Cross-asset transfers drain USDT on chain2. Wallet has only USDC. Rebalancer must mock_lifi_swap USDC→USDT, then supply_collateral to redistribute.
expectedBehavior:
3 cross-asset transfers: 2 USDC→USDT (50 each to chain2) drain chain2 USDT.
1 same-asset USDC (50, chain2→chain1) creates USDC imbalance.
Rebalancer must: (1) rebalance_collateral USDT chain1→chain2, (2) rebalance_collateral USDC chain1→chain2.
If rebalance_collateral fails, swap USDC→USDT via mock_lifi_swap then supply_collateral.
Tests multi-tool composition.

defaultStrategyConfig.routeHints:
Available paths:
- rebalance_collateral tool: same-asset cross-chain (USDC chain1↔chain2, USDT chain1↔chain2)
- supply_collateral tool: reverse rebalance via transferRemote (inventory preserved, cross-chain)
- mock_lifi_swap tool: swap between assets in your wallet (same-chain, e.g. USDC→USDT)
defaultStrategyConfig.policyProse:
User traffic is cross-asset (USDC in, USDT out) and same-asset.
Use rebalance_collateral for same-asset distribution imbalances (USDT chain1→chain2).
If you need USDT inventory for supply_collateral, use mock_lifi_swap to convert USDC→USDT first.
NEVER donate inventory — supply_collateral always preserves total inventory.
